item.title: Python stack on Mavericks
item.description:
As you might expect from numerous blog posts and the general difficulty people have always experienced upgrading mac OS versions, Mavericks caused some truly hideous issues.

The only really "new" issues specifically for Mavericks relate to app nap. The main solution is minrk's appnope. Otherwise, command line options like defaults â€¦
item.dc:creator: napattack (adam.g.ginsburg@gmail.com)
